name: soliloquy
description:
soliloquy is a short simple tile based puzzle game I created over a weekend for LDJam 45, the theme was Start with Nothing.

Game is best experienced at 1280x720 or 1920x1080. Other resolutions are not supported, sorry.

The game features a half working level editor/custom level system. It will work if you line everything up, but if you do something wrong the game may lock up or break. I ran out of time to polish the custom level system, apologies. If you do manage to make a level successfully, I'd love to see you post it in the comments here or on the LDJam page.

Thank you for playing, please, relax and have fun. There is no rush, there is no stress, just you and your mind.

Music created by Hakita
